enemy.name: Warrior
enemy.description: A muscular warrior with a black robe and a battle axe

enemy.name: Priest
enemy.description: A robed figure standing with hands crossed and a burning flame in one hand

enemy.name: Elf
enemy.description: A graceful elf with a bow and a long curved dagger

enemy.name: Snake
enemy.description: A large green snake standing in the center of the room with a crown of golden scales

enemy.name: Skeleton
enemy.description: A humanoid skeleton wearing a tattered cloak with bones

enemy.name: Berserk
enemy.description: A muscular warrior that appears completely unhinged and attacks with a massive club

enemy.name: Maelstrom
enemy.description: A giant creature made of sea serpents wrapped around itself to form a large island that sits in the middle of the room

enemy.name: Undead
enemy.description: A rotting corpse with a dark skull and red eyes, with a large dagger at its belt

enemy.name: Archer
enemy.description: A nimble elf with excellent aim wearing a feathered hood

enemy.name: Dwarf
enemy.description: A short, stout dwarf wearing a suit of thick chainmail and a red cape

enemy.name: Centaur
enemy.description: A giant horse-like centaur standing at 10 feet tall, wearing a red helm with a spear attached
